title: Virtual Teaching Training Course for Emergency Remote Instructional Design and Implementation

context.prior_knowledge: Basic online education platform management skills and science-related teaching experience
context.additional_context: A course designed to cultivate the ability to design and implement effective remote education in emergency situations for university students in medical, legal, and technical professional fields. It teaches how to respond to sudden changes in educational environments based on existing offline class experiences

learning_goals: Learners can apply an emergency remote teaching design process within 24 hours during crisis situations.
Implementing at least three strategies to enhance instructor-learner interaction in designing online learning activities based on mixed-methods research
Conducting real-time video lecture simulations and providing feedback within 48 hours using virtual teaching training tools
Developing discipline-specific (science) digital assessment tools and establishing formative assessment implementation plans
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
